downloadTitle: Project Portfolio Server 2007 Guide: Understanding Workflow
downloadDescription: This guide describes the workflow functionality and configuration for Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007 and provides examples for the workflow setting.

downloadFile.name: Project Portfolio Server 2007 Guide Understanding Workflow.doc

detailsSection: This guide describes the workflow functionality and configuration for Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007 and provides examples for the workflow setting.
detailsSection_file_name: Project Portfolio Server 2007 Guide Understanding Workflow.doc
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download applies to the following Office program:
    • Microsoft Office Project Portfolio Server 2007
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  • Download this document to your computer by clicking the Download button (above) and saving the file to your hard disk.

Instructions for use:
  • Open Project Portfolio Server 2007 Guide Understanding Workflow.doc in Microsoft Word to read or print it.

To remove this download:
  • Delete Project Portfolio Server 2007 Guide Understanding Workflow.doc from your computer.
